body_html: @zhangyaobit Tests are added and have passed locally. One weird thing for kernel_tests/conv2d_transpose_test.py is that if I keep tf.nn.conv2d_transpose inside self.test_session (like the way tests are done for NHWC data format), tensorflow will call the CPU op instead of GPU op. Could you explain why?

body: @zhangyaobit Tests are added and have passed locally. One weird thing for `kernel_tests/conv2d_transpose_test.py` is that if I keep `tf.nn.conv2d_transpose` inside `self.test_session` (like the way tests are done for `NHWC` data format), `tensorflow` will call the `CPU` op instead of `GPU` op. Could you explain why?
